texts.name: Magician Salvation
texts.desc: When this card is activated: You can Set 1 "Eternal Soul" directly from your Deck. If you Normal or Special Summon "Dark Magician" and/or "Dark Magician Girl": You can target 1 of them; Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" or "Dark Magician Girl" with a different name from that monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Magician Salvation" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Magician Salvation" per turn.

texts.name: Shatter the Darkness
texts.desc:
If you Normal or Special Summon a non-Token Normal Monster(s): You can draw 1 card. When an attack is declared involving your monster listed below and an opponent's monster: You can make your monster gain ATK equal to that opponent's monster's ATK, until the end of this turn.
● Level 5 or higher Normal Monster
● Monster that was Ritual Summoned using a Normal Monster
● Monster that was Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Summoned using a Normal Monster as material
You can only use each effect of "Shatter the Darkness" once per turn.

texts.name: The True Light
texts.desc:
Your opponent cannot target "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" in your Monster Zone with card effects. If this face-up card is sent from the Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: Destroy all monsters you control. You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand or GY.
● Set 1 Spell/Trap that specifically lists "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" in its text directly from your Deck, with a different name from the cards you control and in your GY.
You can only use this effect of "The True Light" once per turn.
texts.str3: Set 1 Spell/Trap that lists "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
